item.title: France's 'Doctor Death' jailed for life for fatally poisoning 12 patients
item.description: A court finds Frédéric Péchier guilty of contaminating infusion bags with substances that caused cardiac arrest or hemorrhaging.

item.title: Chelsea waiting for Arsenal in Champions League
item.description: Arsenal will set up an all-English quarter-final against Chelsea in the Women's Champions League if they beat Leuven in the play-offs.

item.title: Briton who fought in Ukraine jailed for 13 years by Russia
item.description: Former British soldier Hayden Davies, labelled a mercenary by Russia, will be sent to a maximum-security prison.

item.title: Duke of Marlborough accused of strangling estranged wife
item.description: The 70-year-old is accused of attacking Edla Marlborough in Oxfordshire between 2022 and 2024.

item.title: How many flu cases are there in your local hospital? Use our tool to check
item.description: Use our interactive tool to explore the latest flu numbers in your area
